main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 1 September 1955 at Huerfano Mesa, New Mexico. The observation lasted 2-3 minutes, and one photo was taken of an object resembling a rainbow at a vertical angle.
interesting points: The sighting location was Huerfano Mesa, New Mexico, a known area for UFO activity.
The observation included a photo of an object that appeared like a rainbow at a vertical angle, but the pilots suspected it to be a parachute.
Despite the suspicion, the source requested urgent analysis of the object in the photos.
The report also mentions multiple images of the sun known as parhelia on slide #4 but no discernible image on slide #5.
The document was forwarded for necessary action, indicating the seriousness with which the report was treated.
sighted object: object resembling a rainbow at a vertical angle
